data.HowToPlay: TWIST GEMS TO MAKE A SET OF 3 OR MORE IN A ROW.

Challenge.Title: CHALLENGE MODE
Challenge.IntroUp: Think you’re smart? Challenge mode has over 80 brain-busting puzzles to test your skill.
Challenge.IntroDwon: Challenge mode is only available in the full version of Bejeweled Twist.

Zen.Title: ZEN MODE
Zen.IntroUp: You can’t lose in this unlimited, relaxing game mode. Explore the galaxy!
Zen.IntroDwon: Zen mode is only available in the full version of Bejeweled Twist.

Classic.Title: CLASSIC MODE
Classic.IntroUp: In the full version you can match your wits with the Doom gem - and score 1,000 points!

Blitz.Title: BLITZ MODE
Blitz.IntroUp: The full version of Bejeweled Twist gives you more time to score!

FullUpsell.Title: Buy the full version and have even more fun with all this:
FullUpsell.FruitDance: Match or destroy a Fruit Gem to see the amazing Mega Fruit Bonus!
FullUpsell.PersonalStats: Track your high scores, your best combos and cascades.
FullUpsell.SuperNovaGem: Rumor has it this gem is created by matching 6 gems in a line.
FullUpsell.ChallengeMode: Over 80 unique Bejeweled Twist puzzles you can unlock.
FullUpsell.ZenMode: Relax in a stress-free mode where Locked and Bomb gems don’t exist.
FullUpsell.RankBar: As you complete levels, challenges or games you can earn stars for your Rank Bar.

LockedGem.Title: LOCKED GEM
LockedGem.Text: This LOCKED GEM can't be moved, but you can still match it!

LightningGem.Title: LIGHTNING GEM
LightningGem.Text: You made a LIGHTNING GEM by matching 5 gems in a row!

FlameGem.Title: FLAME GEM
FlameGem.Text: You can make a FLAME GEM by matching 4 in a row! It will explode when matched!

BombGem.Title: BOMB GEM
BombGem.Text: Watch out for this BOMB GEM! Match it before it ticks down to zero!

BombGemZero.Title: BOMB GEM
BombGemZero.Text: Oh no! The BOMB GEM ticked down to zero… but you have one last chance to defuse it!

CoalGem.Title: COAL GEM
CoalGem.Text: COAL GEMS can’t be matched, but you can destroy them with Flame Gems or Lightning Gems.

FruitGem.Title: FRUIT GEM
FruitGem.Text: Rare gem earned by maxing the Chain Meter. Match it for a surprise!
